CHAT.comment: Dear Becky I miss you. Ples write back to me. Love Chi (nickname)

context notes say Chi and Mot lie on floor. Chi presses hard but doesn't use other hand as grip. Chi writes independently , asking Mot for help with spelling only. Fat walked into room at the beginning but walked out. Fat came back at the end and laughed with Chi , MOT , and EXP after Chi read the letter. Chi decides who to write to and what to write without prompting from Mot , but Mot has to tell Chi to sign her name. Chi seems confident and at ease with writing

u.a: Chi erases , smiles after finishing the word , and then continues to write
